p: Finally, adding EDTA to alcohol-base hand sanitizers, lotions, sprays and soaps should further reduce COVID-19 virus infectivity. The Cosmetic Ingredient Review Expert Panel found that EDTA ingredients are safe as used in cosmetic formulations. The typical concentration of use of EDTA in cosmetics is less than 2%, and the lowest dose reported to cause a toxic effect in animals was 750Â mg/kg/day [41].
